div.ab: Take a dozen dried common walnuts & throw them one after another into a good brazier where they may catch fire, & take them out with small pincers, and let them burn & flame well in the air, and extinguish them in a glass of good wine. Next, let the wine cool and strain it, & pour half of it, for six extinguished walnuts are for one dose. Excellent cure against the suffocation of the matrix.
